```{r}
find_pi = function(B = 5000, seed = 10, make_plot = TRUE){
  # Control seed
  set.seed(seed)
  
  # Simulate B points
  point = matrix(runif(2*B, -1, 1), B, 2)
  hat_pi = 0
  for (i in 1:B) {
  if(point[i,1]^2+point[i,2]^2 <= 1){
     hat_pi = hat_pi + 1}
}
 
 return(hat_pi/5000*4)
}

find_pi()
```
